description: Defines the required metadata and structure for a valid Critical State Rollback Ledger entry, ensuring integrity prior to recovery.

source_component_hash.description: Hash of the system components active during state capture.

integrity_hash_sha512.description: Merkle root hash verifying the integrity of the stored state payload.

signature_chain_hash.description: Reference to the chain of custody signatures required for Level_4_MCR_PreSigned status.

state_payload_reference.description: Secure storage location (e.g., decentralized ledger reference, secure vault URI).
